metadata.synopsis: Karlach reunites with her old friend Fytz in Baldur's gate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Have Companion Karlach in your party.2. Origins debug book -> Karlach -> Act 3b -> An Old Friend -> Teleport to Fytz3. Click on Fytz.

11.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
11.text: Karlach Cliffgate. That can't possibly be you, can it?
11.context: NodeContext: An old friend spotting someone she hasn't seen in 10 years.

16.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
16.text: You look a little different, but I'd know my old friend anywhere.
16.context: NodeContext: Karlach is disguised as another person

13.speaker: Karlach
13.text: Fytz. If you aren't a sight for sore eyes.

31.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
31.text: Where the hells have you been, girl? Last I heard you'd run off to Neverwinter. And that was, what, ten years ago?

21.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
21.text: Gortash. Said you didn't even give notice.

27.speaker: Karlach
27.text: HAH. That prick. But... never mind that. Look at you. The years have been good to you.

35.speaker: Karlach
35.text: Well go on, girl! Tell me everything!

19.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
19.text: First things first - you saw the news, didn't you? About Archduke Gortash?

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Care to introduce me to your friend, Karlach?

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: Of course - this is Fytz. One of my old mates from the neighbourhood. We grew up together, moved to the Lower City together, even worked together for you-know-who.

0.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
0.text: D'you see he's the Archduke now? What the fuck, right?

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: Right?! I'm sure the fox will make a great duke of the henhouse.

14.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
14.text: I think you were the only thing that kept him a little honest. After you left, things got dark, fast. I got out while my soul was still intact.

23.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
23.text: Started working for an arms merchant - still in the trade, as you can see. Met my fella Gregor that way. We've been together eight years now. And - Karlach - we've a little one on the way.

34.speaker: Karlach
34.text: Fytz! That's incredible. Congratulations! Mum life, huh? You're going to be incredible.

10.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
10.text: Gods, I hope so. Even after all these years, it seemed to happen so fast.

25.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
25.text: But now that you're back in town, you must come to ours. All of you. We'll have a good supper, catch up. You can meet Gregor. And the little one, in a few months.

7.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
7.text: Are the two of you together?
7.context: NodeContext: Taking a stab, so a little hesitatnt on the 'together'?

3.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
3.text: Absolutely. You're well-suited. I can tell just by looking at you. Pleasure to meet you, by the way.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: I can't tell you how good it is to see you, Fytz. I'd love to come have dinner with you and Gregor.

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: We're in the city on some urgent business, but can I come find you when it's all settled?

18.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
18.text: I'd love that. Meanwhile, if you're still in the business of intimidation, you should take a look at my stock.

33.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
33.text: Great to have you back, Karlach.

32.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
32.text: You let Karlach Cliffgate slip through your fingers? Poor  thing.

20.speaker: Karlach
20.text: Ew. No. Just mates. Very good mates.

6.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
6.text: Aw. That's lovely. It's a pleasure to meet you.

29.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
29.text: Didn't mean to touch a nerve.

28.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
28.text: What's got you in such a hurry?

15.speaker: Karlach
15.text: Another long, shitty story. I'd love to sit down with a pint and tell 'em all to you, Fytz. And hear every last thing you've been up to, too.

22.speaker: Fytz the Firecracker
22.text: Come find me when you're done doing what you're doing. I'll be here - dawn to dusk on the daily.

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: I'll do that. See you around, Fytz.
